data.headline: Junior Data Scientist with Academic Research Experience
data.summary: Passionate data scientist with a strong academic background and experience in conducting research projects. Skilled in data analysis, machine learning, and problem-solving. Eager to apply my knowledge and contribute to innovative data-driven solutions.

experience.title: Research Assistant
bullets: Collaborated with a team of researchers to design and execute data-driven experiments.
Performed data collection, cleaning, and analysis using Python and SQL.
Contributed to the development of machine learning models to extract insights from complex datasets.
Presented research findings at internal workshops and conferences.

projects.name: Predictive Maintenance for Manufacturing
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict equipment failures in a manufacturing plant, resulting in a 20% reduction in unplanned downtime.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis of Social Media Data
projects.description: Designed and implemented a natural language processing pipeline to analyze customer sentiment from social media posts, providing valuable insights for the marketing team.

certifications.name: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Aditi is a young woman with dark hair, wearing a blue blazer and smiling at the camera.
